Small Business Web Design + Development

No page builder or WordPress - We offer hand-coded, lightning fast, SEO-optimized sites for superior results starting at $150/month.

Learn More Get in Touch

WHAT WE DO

Our expertise lies in crafting personalized web solutions for small businesses across the US. Utilizing manual coding techniques, we guarantee optimal website performance, resulting in increased customer traffic and revenue for your company.

Learn More

Hyper-optimized Website

Visible On Any Device

We design your website to be fully responsive, meaning it will adjust seamlessly to fit all screen sizes, from mobile phones and tablets to desktops. This ensures that new clients will have a great first impression of your website!

A Design Google Loves

A website is only useful if people can find it. That's why we design our websites following all the search engine guidelines, ensuring they have a great position on Google and are easily discoverable by potential customers

User Experience Centered

Our developers use the latest technology available to create websites that are not only fast and secure, but also easy to navigate. This ensures that your website provides the best possible experience for your visitors.

We offer

$0 Down, $150 Per Month

$0 down for a standard 5 page small business website. If you need more than that then we have to do custom pricing based on the scope of work, number of additional pages, and time involved.

You own your domain, content, listing, and profiles. Cancel anytime with no fees or hassle.

Hosting Fees Included

Hosting fees are built right into the monthly payment.

Direct to Developer Customer Service

One of our developers will take your calls, ensuring a quick resolution of your concerns.

Citations And Listings

It's important to have your website linked from other websites, like directories.

Monthly Edits

You get 2 hrs of edits a month for free (normally $90 an hour rate)

Web Design & Development

Includes over 40 hours of design, development, and testing.

Google Analytics & SEO Optimized

We install Analytics for free to monitor traffic and we make it easy for Google to give you a top spot.

Who Are We

Connected Consulting was founded in January of 2023 as a web development company that specializes in servicing small businesses. Our company's approach is personalized to each project, we take the time to get to know our clients and their businesses by understanding their unique needs and goals. From there, we create custom solutions that are tailored to their specific requirements, ensuring that their website stands out from the crowd. We believe that every small business deserves a chance to have a professional online presence and compete in today's digital landscape. Set up a consolation with us today!
